attributes.action: First Aid training should be taught for free and made compulsory in schools and the work place.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe first aid training, should not be limited, to those able to fit a certain criteria or those able to pay the fee required to be trained.

Many incidents happen in a year whereby quick thinking, is needed in order to save a life or stop someone injuries from becoming worse.

If First Aid training was made free, and taught to a wide range of people perhaps, A and E hospitals queues would be cut in half too.

So sign this if you believe the government, should make first aid training compulsory for all.
